title: Top-selling DVDs in the U.S. in 2019
yAxis: Number of units sold in thousands
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of units sold in thousands for 15 number of Moviess.
The Number of units sold in thousands is highest at Movies The Goonies and lowest at Movies Aladdin.
There is a difference of 396.95 between the maximum Movies The Goonies and minimum Movies Aladdin.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Movies, and Number of units sold in thousands in each Movies on the y axis.
Movies The Goonies has the highest Number of units sold in thousands and Aladdin has the lowest Number of units sold in thousands.
